head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RUSSO, PATRICK P.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RUSSO, PATRICK P.

block.p: RUSSO-Patrick P. (President and CEO of Russo Securities), of Grymes Hill, Staten Island, on May 10, 2000. Beloved husband of Carol (nee Tribiano). Loving father of Gregg P. Russo and Lauren Elizabeth Servidio. Dear brother of Fred & Richard Russo. Cherished grandfather of Frank, Daniel, Nicole, Paige and Patrick. Reposing Harmon Home for Funerals, 571 Forest Ave., S.I, NY, Monday and Tuesday 2-4PM & 7-9PM. Mass of Christian burial Assumption Church, on Wednesday 10AM. Entombment Moravian Cemetery. In lieu of flowers, contributions to the American Parkinson's Disease Association, 1250 Hylan Blvd., Staten Island, NY 10305, would be appreciated.
